collection.name: Plague Doctor
collection.openText: “I shall cure you, depriving of every disease and injury you possess.”

observe.desc: [ {Observation record_1 The abnormality asked.Why have you not treated that scar?” Alex said. I had no time so I just gave it a little bit of first aid.” Then the plague doctor answered. “I shall cure you, depriving of every disease and injury you possess.” Alex came out of the chamber with his scar completely healed.} ]
